Posts.Content: Jan 6, 2018 06:19AM AnnaV wrote: I have seen some wonderful results from the French program for cancer survivors - it's a 21 day program that includes post-cancer treatment (thermal water) and overall wellbeing practices of various nature fighting the cancer consequences, but pleasant and calming . Did you ever consider something like that for your mother? Breaking from the old routine, coming to an old French village and see how beautiful women are after all this - may be a new source of energy and strength.
Posts.Title: Post Mastectomy depression Isabellew Moderators
